WASHINGTON TOWNSHIP , Mich. ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] took aim at familiar political targets and [V: added] [ARG1: a few fresh ones] [ARGM-TMP: during a campaign - style rally Saturday night in an Upper]
